title: AI Platform
subtitle: Modular open-source platform for building and managing Data & AI applications
description: A modular open-source platform integrating DataOps, MLOps, DevOps and GitOps principles. It supports the entire lifecycle of AI and data applications — from exploration to deployment, monitoring, auditing and evolution. Enables reproducible, portable, compliant and scalable AI systems.

title: Micromind TinyML Toolkit
subtitle: Toolkit for hardware-aware TinyML models
description: An open toolkit for developing TinyML neural networks optimised for embedded devices. Includes hardware-aware scaled architectures (PhiNets, XiNets), pre-trained models for image and audio tasks, and utilities for accuracy–latency optimisation on microcontrollers.

title: XiNet-Pose
subtitle: Compact pose-estimation model for edge devices
description: A hardware-aware lightweight neural network that extracts human keypoints in real time from RGB images. Optimized to run on low-power microcontrollers and embedded AI accelerators.

title: Tiny Neural Style Transfer
subtitle: Real-time style transfer on edge devices
description: A minimal encoder–decoder model enabling real-time neural style transfer and visual anonymization directly on embedded devices, using hardware-aware scaling for latency and memory efficiency.

title: PhiNet-GAN Face-Swapping
subtitle: Lightweight GAN for face-swapping on edge hardware
description: A compressed generative adversarial network performing face-swapping while meeting strict latency and memory constraints typical of edge devices.

title: XimSwap
subtitle: Ultra-light face-swapping model
description: An extremely compact alternative to GAN-based face-swapping based on feature mapping and blending. Suitable for ultra-low-power MCUs.

title: AudioAnony
subtitle: Edge-based audio anonymization
description: Privacy-preserving audio anonymization system that replaces the speaker’s voice while preserving prosody. Designed to run near the microphone on constrained devices to reduce privacy risks.

title: tinyCLAP
subtitle: Tiny audio event classifier
description: A compressed, hardware-optimized implementation of CLAP for sound event detection on microcontrollers, using quantization, pruning and architecture scaling.

title: Play&Go Platform
subtitle: Gamified platform for sustainable mobility campaigns
description: A gamified mobility engagement platform used by cities, companies and schools. Supports design and monitoring of mobility campaigns, with real-time analytics and game-based behavioural incentives.

title: Kids Go Green
subtitle: Educational mobility platform for schools
description: A playful mobility-education platform that turns sustainable home-to-school travel into collective virtual journeys. Demonstrated impact includes up to 53% reduction in car use.

title: Civic Digital Twin
subtitle: Digital twin for socio-technical systems
description: A digital twin framework for modelling social, infrastructural and behavioural systems. Supports simulation of mobility, tourism, climate resilience and other socio-technical dynamics.

title: Social Media Listening Platform
subtitle: Modular platform for online content monitoring
description: A cloud-native platform for collecting, filtering and analysing multi-source online content. Includes data lakehouse, ingestion pipelines, user-network analytics, topic detection, and hate-speech monitoring.

title: Agricultural Fields Delineation
subtitle: AI tool for crop field characterization
description: Processes multi-temporal remote sensing imagery to delineate agricultural fields, model crop cycles and extract phenological markers for agricultural monitoring.

title: Change Detection Tool
subtitle: Environmental and disaster-induced change detection
description: AI-powered tool for detecting abrupt or long-term changes from remote sensing data. Supports environmental monitoring, disaster assessment, land-use change, and deforestation analysis.
